fileId.description: Id of the file attachment for this expense. Must be a file id

supplierId.description: Id of the supplier for this expense. Must be a valid supplier id

supplierCountry.description: Country code supplier. Must be valid country code

supplierCiNumber.description: VAT/Company number of supplier on expense

expenseId.description: Matched expense id. Required in case of matching to expense

invoiceId.description: Matched invoice id. Required in case of matching to invoice

creditNoteId.description: Matched credit note id. Required in case of matching to credit note

incomeId.description: Matched income id. Required in case of matching to income

paymentTransactionId.description: Matched bank/cash transaction id. Required in case of matching to existing bank/cash transaction

paymentAccountId.description: Id of account, on which payment is done

matchedPaymentAccountId.description: When transferring between accounts, id of account matched to this payment

matchedPaymentTransactionId.description: When transferring between accounts, id of bank/cash transaction matched to this payment

createdDate.description: Date and time when payment was created

paymentDate.description: Date of payment. Required in case of matching with transaction of manual cash/bank account

description.description: Transaction description, may contain customer or supplier name, bank info

createdFromEmail.description: true if expense was created from email

attachmentOverQuota.description: true if expense attachment was created when there where not expense attachments left in quota

totalGrossAmount.description: Summary total gross amount for all lines, calculates on server

totalTaxAmount.description: Total tax amount for expense. This will be re-calculated when posted to the server

unpaidAmount.description: Unpaid amount for expense. This will be re-calculated when posted to the server

currency.description: Defines expense currency, is always set to you account-currency

number.description: Defines the number of the expense. Can be set automatically during POST if ?autonumber=true is specified in query. Otherwise it's required. On accounts running with strict accounting mode, autonumber=true will be ignored on POST and no number can be set during POST and PUT. To assign a number to an expense in strict accounting mode you must use the booking endpoint afterwards.

taxRate.description: The tax rate for this group

netAmount.description: The net amount for this group

taxAmount.description: The tax amount for this group

baseCurrencyNetAmount.description: The net amount for this group in base currency. Will be calculated only for documents in foreign currency.

baseCurrencyTaxAmount.description: The net deduction amount for this group in base currency. Will be calculated only for documents in foreign currency.

file.description: A file attachment. For expenses these properties will be set if you save the expense with an fileId

type.description: MIME type of the file attachment

sizeBytes.description: Size of the file attachment in bytes

thumbnailsUrl.description: You can get the thumbnails for a pdf by GET-ting this url

description.description: The description of my expense(income) line

categoryId.description: Id, of the category of an expense(income). Must be a valid id of an existing category

categoryType.description: Type of category. Must be a valid type belonging to the selected category.

grossAmount.description: The gross amount for this expense(income) line. This will be re-calculated when posted to the server in case of priceDisplayType is "net" or not specified. Required in case of priceDisplayType on line is "gross"

netAmount.description: The net amount for this expense(income) line. This will be re-calculated when posted to the server in case of priceDisplayType is "gross" or not specified. Required in case of priceDisplayType on line is "net"

taxAmount.description: Tax amount for this expense(income) line. This will be re-calculated when posted to the server

priceDisplayType.description: Shows the default price type on line that will be displayed on the debitoor website. Default is "gross"

incomeTaxDeductionAmount.description: The part of income tax deduction that applies to this expense(income) line. This will be re-calculated when posted to the server in case incomeTaxDeductionAmount is specified for whole expense(income). Only present if you are in ES, IT, IC, CO or GB

assetLifetime.description: The expected lifetime value of an asset. If this property is set, assetSalvageValue and assetDepreciation is required.

assetSalvageValue.description: The salvage value of an asset. If this property is set, assetLifetime and assetDepreciation is required.

assetDepreciation.depreciation: Depreciation table for an asset. If this property is set, assetLifetime and assetSalvageValue is required.

depreciationDate.description: The yearly date of the expense cost

reverseCharge.description: Reverse charge details for non domestic purchase from one EU country to another (intraEu purchase)

taxRate.description: Reverse charge vat rate in percent. Required for non domestic purchase from one EU country to another (intraEu purchase). Not allowed for all other purchases

taxAmount.description: Reverse charge vat amount. Read only, will be recalculated by server on POST and PUT

productOrService.description: Is this a product or service? Required for non domestic purchase from one EU country to another (intraEu purchase). Not allowed for all other purchases

consumptionOrResale.description: Is this for consumption or resale? Required for non domestic purchase from one EU country to another (intraEu purchase). Not allowed for all other purchases

incomeTaxDeductionAmount.description: The total income tax deduction for all the lines on the expense. You can only submit a value here if you are in ES, IT, IC, CO or GB

unpaidAmountChange.description: The unpaid amount on this expense, has been changed by the amount specified here.

generated.description: Additional information if this expense was automatically generated

type.description: Type of this automatically generated expense

accountName.description: Name of associated payment account if requested by ?expand=generated

period.description: Time period of this automatically generated expense

createdDate.description: Timestamp of creation of this document

lastModifiedDate.description: Timestamp of last modification of this document

deletedDate.description: Timestamp of deletion of this document. Deleted documents are only included on lists, if you specify the querystring ?includeDeleted=true in your GET
